channel.title: Drum sample challenge
channel.description:
https://app.auxy.co/projects/I17lUafFKf_L3zVQlkTNMw== It’s amazing what you can do with any given sample... I wanna hear what else one can do with a group of samples, so I’ve issued a:
**_crazy challenge!_**
Rules: Create a drum kit with at least **five** samples.
You must tweak each of them enough to change the overall feel of the sample and use it as a sound that it otherwise would not normally be used for. An example is the kick drum in the link above. I used a percussion Tom.
Please DM me all entries in Auxy project link.
**Do not** put the link here.
**Prize:** TBA
**deadline**: none

item.title: Drum sample challenge
item.dc:creator: VJM
item.description:
Yes, though the link you have sent me to my original project.

I wanna hear what else one can do with a group of samples, so I’ve issued a:

You must tweak each of them enough to change the overall feel of the sample and use it as a sound that it otherwise would not normally be used for. An example is the kick drum in the link above. I used a percussion Tom.

Please DM me all entries in Auxy project link.
